revised_title: A Unified Theory of Matter and Physics
tldr: Thomas Exley presents a new theory of physics based on two propositions: every atom consists of an immense sphere of force, and atoms differ in their absolute forces. He classifies atoms into four types and explains various phenomena, including vegetation, miasmata, and aroma of plants, through this theory. Exley claims that his principles encompass and unify many existing partial theories in physics.
